attributes.review: I opened the app to see what a campaign in the 21st century would look like, moving into the digital age, it is a fantastic idea and it reaches a large base of people. It tears my heart to think that this gremlin represents the whole United States and her people. An absolute atrocity to the 21st century and to the modern man.
